content.body: Is a non-TC39 delegate allowed to contribute to a proposal? (I presume no)
Jacob Smith: https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/blob/HEAD/CONTRIBUTING.md#helping-with-existing-proposals is addressed to everyone, I believe.
content.formatted_body: Jacob Smith: https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/blob/HEAD/CONTRIBUTING.md#helping-with-existing-proposals is addressed to everyone, I believe.
